page.title: 06The Health Centre, Newent
page.content:
This modern purpose-built Centre is located on land once occupied by one of the largest town houses The Holts. { The Holts Health Centre}was completed in 1975 and caters for the health and welfare of the district and contains Doctors and Dentists surgeries and other social and welfare groups. This modern complex situated on Broad Street also houses the local{Police {Station}and soon a new{library}will be built on the same site. The Holts site also has the benefit of car parks and also this area of Broad Street is a designated{bus stop}both into and out of Newent.
Concern has been expressed about road crossing in this busy part of Newent and recent discussions in the Town Council were about safety and possible pedestrian controlled crossings.
